short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for helping with eVpT-related tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension where you can input an XML string, and get it converted into an escaped single-line string, for usage in scripts and Rundeck commands.
